long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Timestripe is a goal-oriented workspace that helps you and your team to achieve goals. It is listed as one of the Best To-do List Apps 2024 by Tool Finder.

Now it’s just one click away from your daily browsing! Meet our Google extension, your productivity co-pilot. The possibilities are endless, but here are some examples of what you can do with it:
— Plan further with Horizons. Set plans for longer time periods and link milestones to daily tasks.
— Instantly turn web content into tasks with linked references.
— Stay on schedule with time blocking. Quickly rearrange tasks across different time slots and mark them as completed.
— Instantly add and assign tasks. Input tasks on the fly, even during meetings, without breaking your focus.
— Create lists using templates. Take advantage of ready-made template lists for more efficient work. 
— Take notes while browsing. Use the powerful note-taking editor without leaving the browser page.

Explore more using our mobile app and web-version. Timestripe elevates teamwork with dedicated Spaces designed for collaborative efforts. Assign tasks to team members with a simple click, and use our Gallery of Templates to jumpstart your projects. The Team View option provides a clear overview of everyone’s contributions, and with our advanced Statistics, you can track and analyse progress to continuously improve efficiency and results. Start transforming your workday with Timestripe today!
